caption: In one place, a man had a gunpowder barrel tied to his chest and was being threatened by people holding torches, seemingly trying to make him reveal something. However, the man appeared completely unaware, struggling desperately and expressing his innocence.In another location, two groups of horsemen confronted each other, with a woman in red among one of the groups. The leaders of both groups engaged in taunts and jibes, appearing to be brothers with a strained relationship, as they contested something. They engaged in a war of words and eventually dispersed separately.Meanwhile, at another location, a female leader led a group of horsemen to a city in the desert, only to be rejected at the city's entrance, causing their anger. It wasn't until another person came out to welcome them.
